```{r setup, include=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(root.dir = "~/Documents/GitHub/CogSci_F25", echo = TRUE)

install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
```

## Load in data
```{r}
df_true <- read.csv("~/Documents/GitHub/CogSci_F25/NLP/data/True.csv")
df_fake <- read.csv("~/Documents/GitHub/CogSci_F25/NLP/data/Fake.csv")
```

## Add column with binary True/false indicator
```{r}
# 1 = True
df_true <- df_true %>% mutate(label = 1)

#0 = False
df_fake <- df_fake %>% mutate(label = 0) 
```

## Combine dfs
```{r}
# Combine them into one dataframe
df <- bind_rows(df_true, df_fake)
```

## Shuffle rows
```{r}
set.seed(983)  #Making it reproducible 
df <- df[sample(nrow(df)), ]
```

## Saving df as CSV
```{r}
write.csv(df, "combined_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
